name: They That Put
description:
This one won't be for everyone, but sometimes you've just got to put yourself out there, you know? 

Psalm 2: They That Put is a short piece of interactive fiction, depending on how loosely you define interactive, uh, and fiction. It's probably more like an essay with a couple gimmicks. It is short though. Definitely got that going for it. 

Psalms is an anthology of short digital fiction. Some entries are games, others are visual novels. And some - well, you'll see. Check in for new psalms every quarter.
